page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JAMES
page.content: I{WAKE}UP AT SEVEN O CLOCK, I{READ}A BOOK AND AFTER THAT I HAVE{BREAKFAST.} THEN I GET DRESSED. AFTERWARDS I PRACTICE HITTING MARBLES. AFTER THAT I GET IN THE CAR AND MY{MUM}DRIVES ME TO {SCHOOL.}THEN I PLAY{FOOTBALL. WHEN THE WHISTLE GOES WE GO UPSTAIRS AND READ DURING REGISTRATION. AT NINE O'CLOCK WE GO INTO{ASSEMBLY.}NEXT WE DO{LANGUAGE WORK}UNTIL{PLAYTIME.}AFTER PLAY WE DO{MATHS,}I LIKE DOING LOTS OF SUMS. AT MIDDAY WE GO TO{LUNCH.}I HAVE A CHEESE SANDWICH, A BANANA AND A DRINK. IN THE AFTERNOON WE MIGHT{WORK, PAINT {OR DRAW}AND HAVE{A STORY. WHEN WE GO{HOME,}I WATCH{TELEVISION, UNTIL MY{DAD}GETS HOME, THEN WE HAVE {TEA.}I LIKE TO GO OUT AND{PLAY}WITH FRIENDS OR RIDE MY BIKE.ON MONDAY I GO TO{JUDO.}WE LEARN SELF DEFENCE. I HAVE A WASH AND GO TO{BED}AT NINE O'CLOCK.
